body_html:
estimator.export_savedmodel exports the model to a directory, and the proto file there isn't a GraphDef, which is why you're getting the error.

Unfortunately, this isn't documented well enough yet, but to load an exported saved model, use LoadSavedModel in C++

@sukritiramesh @nfiedel @skye @josh11b : Shouldn't the saved model loader be included in the C++ API documentation at https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/cc/ ?
